website_summaries.verdict: The sportiest style in our roundup. Their shape and style is a good alternative to other models for some, but they look better than they shade the sun.
pros: Combines polarized glass lenses and metal frames in a flattering rectangle style
Lenses are curved for comfort and polarized
cons: They are a bit costly, and consumers found that they don't block sun as well as others they tried

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it real... this is the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely authentic Ray Ban as the lens etching, nose pad RB insignia, overall material weight and quality are all present. Luxottica [eyewear mothership] does manufacture some RB in China. I'm not sure what other reviewers are getting but my pair exceeded my expectations for the price point. Polarized lenses are vivid and clear even in inclimate rainy weather. Big plus on long interstate drives and daily commute.
customer_reviews.author: rAcErCoSmO

customer_reviews.title: Lens fell right out while wearing
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these until a lens popped out as I was wearing them. Thankfully it was within the 30 day return window so back they went. This pair was Chinese, but honestly Italians are not traditionally very good manufacturers either. Ray Ban was originally an American brand, I wish someone would buy it and start making them here again.
customer_reviews.author: Juice Box

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressive Ray Ban's for a premium price
customer_reviews.text: I used to love Ray Ban's. Then they got expensive. And cheap. This pair is such an example. The frame quality feels light and flimsy, and the glass lenses have no substance to them. Honestly could not tell if they were glass or plastic, but just had to take the manufacturer's word for it. Oddly, the more expensive Ray Ban polarized glasses (in to 200-300 range) feel much heftier and the glass looks and feels thicker. But seriously, for over 100 bucks, I expect better.
customer_reviews.author: outwest

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair I bought at a store in the mall and my kids stepped on them and I loved them so I ordered these as a replacement. These are no where near the comfort of my original Ran-Bans I paid top dollar for. The nose piece is cheap and it hurts my nose. Also, they keeps slipping off my face. I would not recommend buying these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great shade
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I love these glasses. But, like all fashion choices, they are a matter of preference. I have an oval shaped head and face and they fit and look sharp. The polarized tinting is top notch, and the quality is true to Ray-Ban.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Raines

customer_reviews.title: No polarizing effect.
customer_reviews.text: Nope this is not for me. I have same model the other one which is green in color. As i like the green one with polarization, i wanted to try this . But i didn't like this for the reason this doesn't give me any polarizing effect. If you care for polarization then pick the green one. Its awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Santosh G

customer_reviews.title: great sunglasses reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses were a little big for my face, I was looking at a similar ray-ban pair however these were about $50 cheaper. They feel and look super high quality, I wish I would've tried them on in a store before I purchased but that was my fault. They've very solid and I love the blue gradient provides a very nice effect for driving, they're super comfortable more than my old oakleys that these replaced. I'd recommend these to anyone looking for a nice pair of ray-bans I would caution people with smaller faces to try these on first, overall they're excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great sunglasses. I got these specifically since they are polarized and they work well. The lens are glass and the frames are well made. Does matter whether they are made in China by me as long as they work as advertise in case they do.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S. Coble

customer_reviews.title: cheep sunglasses for high price
customer_reviews.text: This price is very high for this sunglasses - they are good but not made in USA or Italy, they are made in China and...they are not sleek !
customer_reviews.author: Kras

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say I have a narrow face, but not a fat one either. they stick out just a little bit too wide, even after heating up and adjusted at the eyeglass store. Love the gradient lens. can look down and see fine while the sun is kept out up top. Always always always get polarized lenses. they take the glare off everything. Look great. The nosepieces are a little uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Hilles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses are stylish comfortable and fit perfectly. They are lightweight, but feel like they are constructed out of quality material. The gradient lenses take some getting used to, but it should dissuade anyone from purchasing. They have easily become my favorite pair of sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: aaron jones

customer_reviews.title: If I had a bigger head - they would have been great.
customer_reviews.text: Huge glasses. Too big for my face. Sent them back. If I had a bigger head - they would have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Starbuck

customer_reviews.title: Love them, quick delivery and perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! This pair replaces the same model. The lens cracked after dropping my old ones. The new pair were60% of what I paid for the originals. Thank you

customer_reviews.title: Ray Ban Polarized Rectangle Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sunglasses for my husband as Christmas gift and he loves them! I originally ordered non-polarized sunglasses by mistake and sent them back. I ordered these and they arrived within two days! They are great quality and look expensive. I am very pleased with the whole process of returning and replacing items through Amazon. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Momof5boys

customer_reviews.title: like the lens might be loose or not fitted properly
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper than buying them at the store. My only problem, since this was a replacement for ones that I bought at Sunglasses Hut is that these seem to creak a bit, like the lens might be loose or not fitted properly. There isn't any visual difference.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Warren

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I've never payed this amount of money before for sunglasses but I figured I'd try it out and more importantly try not to break them. I've had them now for over a year and they are still in perfect shape. very light weight and not only do they look great but they work great too.
customer_reviews.author: Frankiemero

customer_reviews.title: First time glasses buyer
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, I am 33 years old and have never purchased a pair of glasses but after trying on several pairs locally I arrived upon this model Ray-Bans and quickly new they were the ones. I absolutely love this model frame with the polarized lenses and would recommend to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made in China, I'll see if they hold up. If so, I'll bump up the rating.

customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Never get any other brand. They are a tad bit heavy, but they are glass lenses. Pleased

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Leads to Broken Lens
customer_reviews.text: Went to put them on and a lens popped out onto a concrete floor and broke. Unfortunately, I'm beyond the 30 day return window. Guess I'm screwed...

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and they do look nice on him. They are well made.

customer_reviews.text: They are ok, lens seem cheap not what have typically seen with RayBans

customer_reviews.title: Made in China, not the same as made in Italy
customer_reviews.text: The description said made in Italy but when the arrived I found them stamped "made in china", the quality was notiably worse than any other pair of RB's I've had too. I've been buying RayBans all my life, but I'm not preparred to pay European prices for inferior quality 3rd word products, these might as well have been fake. They will be my last pair of RB's, I'll find a better quality brand.
customer_reviews.author: coldbeers

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality, Fitment was perfect and price could not ...
customer_reviews.text: First pair of purchased sunglasses and Item is as described, excellent quality, Fitment was perfect and price could not be beat. I recommend for all to purchase and you will not be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: A Definite Buy
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses were awesome! Unlike the Aviators or Wayfares you don't see yourself coming and going with these pairs. I ordered them with Prime on a Friday and it arrived with USPS on Sunday! Who would have known. The sunglasses are made in China but are Ray Ban Genuine. I think only Wayfares are made now in Italy. Over all great product! I would buy another pair for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: look like chipped: ((( Or used

customer_reviews.title: Poor hinges
customer_reviews.text: Overall just an okay pair of sunglasses. Arms are not flopping everywhere but looser just after 15 hrs of use. I wish the hinges had springs like the good ol' days. They still look good and serve their purpose as polarized lenses sunglasses

customer_reviews.title: Ray Ban #1

customer_reviews.text: Priced at least $40 cheaper here in amazon. Original. Made in Italy. Polarized. Make sure to try it on at your local sunglass hut or mall for correct fit.

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses, needs a better case

The case however split in half when I left it and the glasses in my car during the day when it was about 20 degrees F out. I went to open the case to remove the glasses and the case snapped and broke in two - the glasses were fine though.

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of sunlgasses
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look and style of these sunglasses. They fit my face well and are polarized to reduce the amount of sunlight that gets through. The top of the lens are a darker blue that fades as you look downwards. Haven't dropped them yet so i have no idea how durable they are but i enjoy them so far. Not too tight around the head either

customer_reviews.title: One Year Later - No Thanks
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sunglasses for my husband a year ago, as a birthday gift. Within 1 week, the first lens cracked. By the end of the first month, both were cracked. This is ridiculous considering I gifted his last pair of Ray Bans to him in 2009 and they lasted 5 years! This year, he actually asked me to consider a different brand. I sincerely hope this item is a knock off. The quality sucks and my husband is now disenchanted with Ray Ban.

product_meta.title: Ray-Ban RB 3478 Sunglasses
product_meta.description:
Modern design and utility combine effortlessly in this Black Forest 2.0 Shell 3L 15K Pant. Our ski pants feature FN DRY 15K fabrication, hydrophilic lamination, a durable water-repellent treatment that provides outstanding warmth and moisture management, and articulated knees to offer extended mobility. An adjustable waistband in our waterproof pants adds added comfort, and zippered cuffs and snow gaiters deliver snow protection. It’s finished with a zippered ventilation system and three watertight pockets. What we do is sacred to us. The passion we have for sports, technology, innovation, service, and unconventional thinking unites us and enables us to do our best work. We surround ourselves with people who bring that same intensity and excitement to the work they do. We ensure our manufacturing facilities meet all of Oakley’s rigorous and uncompromising standards to allow us to achieve the highest possible level of quality. We consistently monitor production and regularly test components to ensure products made in our facilities continue to earn the right to bear the Oakley icon. If it’s not good enough for the world’s best, it’s not good enough. That goes for each and every product we make, no matter where we make it.

Ray-Ban is the world's most iconic eyewear brand and is a global leader in its sector. Every model in the Ray-Ban collection is the product of meticulous, original styling that translates the best of the latest fashion trends into an ever-contemporary look for millions of Ray-Ban wearers around the world. From the early Aviator style that emerged in 1937 to the introduction of the classic Wayfarer in 1952, Ray-Ban is a brand that embodies America and adventure, great cities and wide-open spaces, heroism, individuality, and authenticity. Starting with a silver screen debut in 1961, Ray-Ban sunglasses have appeared throughout hundreds of films and have been a favorite on the Hollywood scene for years, both on and off the screen. With timeless and imaginative styles, Ray-Ban consistently blends high-tech design, lenses, and materials. The collection remains true to its classic heritage while continuously evolving to meet today's fashion demands.
feature_bullets: Rectangular sunglasses with metal frames featuring nose pads and logoing at arms
Protective case included, cases come in a variety of colors.
